description: The Gordon-Brown family sells the company to former Chamber of Commerce president Alan Jackson.
title: Sark's only electricity provider sold for 'undisclosed fee'
title_page: Sark's only electricity provider sold for 'undisclosed fee' - BBC News
maintext: Mr Gordon-Brown added they had known Mr Jackson for years and his "energy and passion" for the island's future had "given us the confidence to entrust him with our family's legacy".
